Field Label:
Please be aware that by selecting 'I agree' you are consenting to your information being shared with the eLwazi team for ongoing communications, tracking, evaluation and reporting purposes. Your personal information will be de-identified whenever used in any type of reporting. Furthermore, your personal information will not be shared with any 3rd parties beyond eLwazi without your explicit permission. You may also at any time request that your information be removed from this database. To remove your information please contact https://helpdesk.elwazi.org/. 

The project metadata that you share on this database will be used specifically for public display on the eLwazi Catalogue, the metadata can be updated, edited and maintained by yourself as the project Data Steward. If you have queries you can also communicate directly with the eLwazi Data Support Working Group leads: Lyndon Zass or Tony Burdett.
